archimate:Capability.name: Trip Management
archimate:Capability.documentation: Ability to plan, track, prepare for, depart, arrive, and adjust a journey between a starting point location and one or more targeted locations, until a final destination is reached.

properties.value: Ability to plan, track, prepare for, depart, arrive, and adjust a journey between a starting point location and one or more targeted locations, until a final destination is reached.
